txt.en: 'The hobgoblins and Orcs are at odds? Why am I not surprised to hear that? Their pact has been tenuous at best since the war began! I will make sure no hobgoblins get past the Steepset!'
Gazathrug's outpost can be found in the southern part of Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Hetbrúda at Gazathrug's outpost.
Talk to Hetbrúda at Gazathrug's outpost
Zidir-nesad, the Steepset, can be found in the western part of Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Hetbrúda at Zidir-nesad.
'We need to find out what happened here and where Gazathrug is. Let us search the outpost. Perhaps Gazathrug left a clue to his whereabouts.'
Gazathrug's fear of losing the Upper Reaches of Máttugard are quite warranted.
'Wait, [placeholder], do you hear that? Someone is coming!'
Zidir-nesad, the Steepset, can be found in the western part of Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Voina at Zidir-nesad.

'It would seem that a large number of Zhélruka venture to the Steepset, following Prince Ingór, no doubt. Well, we should tell someone about the hobgoblins and Orcs fighting each other. I'm sure there is a high ranking Zhélruka commander around here somewhere!\n\n'Before you go, I just wanted to thank you for accompanying me on this adventure. It turned out somewhat differently than I expected, but I suppose that is the way of adventuring, is it not? I might stick to exploring Máttugard, for now, but if you decide to explore deeper into Gundabad, I will understand. Best of luck to you, [placeholder].'
